sense.gloss: sake cup, cup for alcoholic beverages
one cup (of), one glass (of), one bowl (of), cupful, glassful, bowlful, spoonful
fully, to capacity, to the maximum, as much as possible
the best one can do, one's best effort
with all one's might, to the best of one's ability
toast, drink (in honor or celebration of someone or something)
with all one's strength, with might and main, as hard as one can
bitter cup, bitter experience, bitter defeat, ordeal
Emperor's cup, trophy given by the Emperor
three cups of sake which latecomers to a party are made to drink
sake cup, cup for alcoholic beverages
counter for cupfuls, bowlfuls, spoonfuls, etc.
counter for cupfuls, bowlfuls, spoonfuls, etc.
having one's hands full, not having any room to do more, at the limit
tipsy, a little drunk, slightly intoxicated
offering a cup (of sake) in return
alcohol which must be drunk as a penalty
to the limit, to the full, as much as possible, with all one's might
vinegar, soy sauce and mirin (or sugar) mixed in roughly equal proportions
pledge made over sake cups, exchange of nuptial cups
small vessel or bowl in which sake cups are rinsed
to play a trick on, to cheat, to deceive, to dupe
to have one cup of sake after another
Emperor's Cup, trophy given to tournament winners
glasses and plates being scattered about after a party or banquet, articles lying about in a jumble
to the limit, to the fullest extent, absolutely the limit, the best one can do, breaking even
one cup after another, cup by cup
brimming with health (vigor, vigour), full of vitality, full of health

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はコーヒーを３↑杯↑↓はい↓も↑飲↑↓の↓んだよ。
sdata.e: You've drunk three cups of coffee.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑杯↑↓はい↓のビジネスプラン、↑絵↑↓え↓に↑描↑↓えが↓いた↑餅↑↓もち↓にならんことを↑切↑↓せつ↓に↑望↑↓のぞ↓むよ。
sdata.e: This business plan of yours seems almost too optimistic. All I can say is I hope it's more than just wishful thinking.

sdata.j: ↑苦労↑↓くろう↓や↑心配↑↓しんぱい↓が↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑心↑↓こころ↓を↑一↑↓いっ↓↑杯↑↓ぱい↓にしていた。
sdata.e: Cares and worries were pervasive in her mind.

sdata.j: ↑強↑↓つよ↓いコーヒー↑一↑↓いっ↓↑杯↑↓ぱい↓がなければなかなか↑目↑↓め↓が↑覚↑↓さ↓めない。
sdata.e: It is hard to wake up without a strong cup of coffee.

sdata.j: ↑競争↑↓きょうそう↓の↑後↑↓のち↓に、ジェーンは↑麦茶↑↓むぎちゃ↓を２↑杯↑↓はい↓のみました。
sdata.e: Having run the race, Jane had two glasses of barley tea.

sdata.j: ↑牛乳↑↓ぎゅうにゅう↓をもう↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓いかがですか。
sdata.e: Won't you have another glass of milk?

sdata.j: ↑休憩↑↓きゅうけい↓↑時間↑↓じかん↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓、タカシとハルミは↑劇場↑↓げきじょう↓のバーで↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓↑飲↑↓の↓んだ。
sdata.e: During the interval, Takashi and Harumi got a drink at the theater bar.

sdata.j: ↑乾杯↑↓かんぱい↓！
sdata.e: Bottoms up!

sdata.j: ↑皆↑↓みな↓さん、↑今夜↑↓こんや↓は↑無礼講↑↓ぶれいこう↓で↑行↑↓い↓きましょう。それでは、↑乾杯↑↓かんぱい↓。
sdata.e: All right, everyone, let's not stand on ceremony tonight. Cheers!

sdata.j: ↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓の↑帰↑↓かえ↓りに、ちょっと↑一↑↓いっ↓↑杯↑↓ぱい↓やってかないか。
sdata.e: Want to grab a drink on the way home?

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓みんなに↑臨時↑↓りんじ↓ボーナスが↑出↑↓で↓るって↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑言↑↓い↓ったけど、↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓くわせたのかい。
sdata.e: Were you just pulling my leg when you said we were all going to get extra bonuses?

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑殺人↑↓さつじん↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓に↑対↑↓たい↓する↑怒↑↓いか↓りで↑胸↑↓むね↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑杯↑↓はい↓になった。
sdata.e: We were filled with anger against the murderer.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓の↑友人↑↓ゆうじん↓のために↑乾杯↑↓かんぱい↓しよう。
sdata.e: Let's drink a toast to our friends!

sdata.j: ↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑帰↑↓かえ↓って↑朝食↑↓ちょうしょく↓を↑腹一杯↑↓はらいっぱい↓に↑食↑↓た↓べた。
sdata.e: I went home and ate a hearty breakfast.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なん↓↑杯↑↓はい↓か↑飲↑↓の↓むと、その↑男↑↓おとこ↓は↑酔↑↓よ↓って↑気持↑↓きも↓ちよくなった。
sdata.e: After a couple of drinks, the guy was feeling no pain.

sdata.j: ↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓↑付↑↓つ↓き↑合↑↓あ↓いませんか。
sdata.e: Would you join me in a drink?

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いっ↓↑杯↑↓ぱい↓↑頂↑↓いただ↓いても↑構↑↓かま↓いません。
sdata.e: I wouldn't mind a drink.

sdata.j: ↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓やりたいなあ。
sdata.e: I feel like a drink.

sdata.j: ↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓やりたいきがする。
sdata.e: I feel like having a drink.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いっ↓↑杯↑↓ぱい↓のミルクを↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please give me a cup of milk.

sdata.j: ミルクを↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓ください。
sdata.e: Please give me a cup of milk.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いっ↓↑杯↑↓ぱい↓のコーヒーを↑飲↑↓の↓んだら↑頭↑↓あたま↓がすっきりした。
sdata.e: A cup of coffee cleared my head.

sdata.j: コーヒー↑１↑↓いっ↓↑杯↑↓ぱい↓で↑頭↑↓あたま↓がすっきりしたよ。
sdata.e: A cup of coffee cleared my head.

sdata.j: ↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓どう？
sdata.e: How about a drink?

sdata.j: ↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓ごちそうしようか。
sdata.e: Can I buy you a drink?

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いっ↓↑杯↑↓ぱい↓ください。
sdata.e: Give me a shot.

sdata.j: ↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓おごりましょう。
sdata.e: I'll buy you a drink.

sdata.j: ↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓おごらせて↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Let me buy you a drink.

sdata.j: ↑１↑↓いっ↓↑杯↑↓ぱい↓おごろう。
sdata.e: Let me buy you a drink.

sdata.j: ↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓いかがですか。
sdata.e: Want a drink?
